name: Planet of Farming
description:
Welcome to planet Fay! Where anyone can be a perfectly fun farmer! With 9 plots of land at your disposal, a shop, and a chef to cook up ingredients, make money by farming. It's quite simple! Unlike most sim games this one is simple and small, easy to learn the layout, and, again dare I say it, simple.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • E or I - Inventory
  • ESC - Go to Menu
  • M - Toggle music

Tutorial

  1. Find the merchant in green
  2. Get 20 free carrot seeds
  3. Go to an empty farm plot
  4. Click the carrots button to plant them
  5. Stand by it to plant and harvest, it will grow on it's own
  6. Use sell buttons on the bottom of the shop UI to sell (each button correlates to an inventory slot)

FAQ

  • I have seeds, but I can't get them to plant Make sure you have the correct amount of seeds, some plants, such as wheat, require more. All plots have a text area with the amount of seeds each crop needs to fill a plot.
  • How do I sell items? When you go up to a merchant, you can look at the bottom of the UI to see the word "Sell" accompanied by 6 boxes, each one relates to an inventory slot. Clicking on one will sell 1 item.
  • Is there a way to buy/sell multiple items at once? No, think of it like a clicker game XD
  • I'm clicking the button to buy stuff, but I'm not getting it. Make sure you have your inventory open, click I or E. If not, you may not have enough money.
